tika-abh03t0:5_0: Dhātukathāpakaraṇaṁ desento bhagavā yasmiṁ samaye desesi,
tika-abh03t0:5_2: vibhaṅgānantaraṁ desitassa pakaraṇassa dhātukathābhāvaṁ dassetuṁ vā “aṭṭhārasahī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t0:5_6: maccumārassa ca bodhimūle eva bhañjitattā parūpanissayarahitaṁ niratisayaṁ taṁ bhañjanaṁ upādāya bhagavā eva “mārabhañjano”ti thomito.
tika-abh03t0:6_1: abhidhammakathādhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vāti katvā tesaṁ kathanato imassa pakaraṇassa dhātukathāti adhivacanaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:6_2: Yadipi aññesu ca pakaraṇesu te sabhāvā kathitā,
tika-abh03t0:6_3: ettha pana tesaṁ sabbesaṁ saṅgahāsaṅgahādīsu cuddasasu nayesu ekekasmiṁ kathitattā sātisayaṁ kathananti idameva evaṁnāmakaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:6_5: Khandhāyatanadhātūhi vā khandhādīnaṁ araṇantānaṁ saṅgahāsaṅgahādayo nayā vuttāti tattha mahāvisayānaṁ
tika-abh03t0:6_6: dhātūnaṁ vasena dhātūhi kathā dhātukathāti evaṁ assa nāmaṁ vuttanti veditabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:6_7: Dvidhā tidhā chadhā aṭṭhārasadhāti anekadhā dhātubhedaṁ pakāsesīti dhātubhedappakāsanoti.
tika-abh03t0:6_10: “Yaṁ dhātukatha”nti vā ettha pakaraṇanti vacanaseso sattannaṁ pakaraṇānaṁ kamena vaṇṇanāya pavattattāti
tika-abh03t0:6_11: tena yojanaṁ katvā tassa pakaraṇassa atthaṁ tassatthanti a-kāralopo vā.
tika-abh03t0:6_13: taṁ vā atthaṁ taṁdīpanavacanasavanena upadhārethāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:10_3: aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ pakaraṇaparicchedo vutto evāti dassento āha “cuddasavidhena vibhattanti vutta”nti.
tika-abh03t0:10_5: khandhādayo eva vā nīyanti ñāyanti etehi pakārehīti nayā,
tika-abh03t0:10_8: Etesaṁ padānaṁ mūlabhūtattāti “mūlamātikā”ti vattabbānaṁ saṅgahāsaṅgahādīnaṁ cuddasannaṁ padānaṁ khandhādidhammavibhajanassa
tika-abh03t0:12_2: paṭiccasamuppādavacanena ca yesu dvādasasu aṅgesu paccekaṁ paṭiccasamuppādasaddo vattati,
tika-abh03t0:12_3: tadatthāni dvādasa padāni dassitānīti tesaṁ tathādassitānaṁ sarūpeneva dassitānaṁ phassādīnañca padānaṁ vasena āha “pañcavīsādhikena padasatenā”ti.
tika-abh03t0:12_4: Tattha kammupapattikāmabhavādīnaṁ idha vibhattānaṁ bhāvanabhavanabhāvena bhave viya sokādīnaṁ jarāmaraṇassa
tika-abh03t0:12_5: viya aniṭṭhattā tannidānadukkhabhāvena ca jarāmaraṇe antogadhatāya paṭiccasamuppādassa dvādasapadatā
tika-abh03t0:12_7: Ettha ca pāḷiyaṁ bhinditvā avissajjitānampi satipaṭṭhānādīnaṁ bhinditvā gahaṇaṁ karonto tesaṁ bhinditvāpi vissajjitabbataṁ dassetīti veditabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:13_0: Nayamātikādikā lakkhaṇamātikantā mātikā pakaraṇantarāsādhāraṇatāya dhātukathāya mātikā nāma,
tika-abh03t0:13_1: tassā abbhantare vutto vibhajitabbānaṁ uddeso abbhantaramātikā nāmāti imamatthaṁ pakāsento “ayañhī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t0:13_5: Dhātukathāya abbhantareyevāti ca dhātukathāmātikāya abbhantareyevāti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:13_6: Tadāveṇikamātikāabbhantare hi ṭhapitā tassāyeva abbhantare ṭhapitāti vuttā.
tika-abh03t0:13_8: mātikā”ti etena vacanena dhātukathāto bahibhūtā kusalādiaraṇantā mātikā pakaraṇantaragatā vuttā,
tika-abh03t0:13_10: Dhātukathāya abbhantareyevāti ca imassa pakaraṇassa abbhantare eva sarūpato dassetvā ṭhapitattāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:13_11: Sabbassa abhidhammassa mātikāya asaṅgahitattā vikiṇṇabhāvena pakiṇṇakatā veditabbā.
tika-abh03t0:15_1: Nayānaṁ pavattidvārabhūtā saṅgahāsaṅgahaviyogīsahayogīdhammā nayamukhānīti tesaṁ uddeso nayamukhamātikā.
tika-abh03t0:15_2: Cuddasapi hi saṅgahāsaṅgahasampayogavippayogānaṁ vomissakatāvasena pavattāti yehi te cattāropi honti,
tika-abh03t0:15_3: te dhammā cuddasannampi nayānaṁ mukhāni hontīti.
tika-abh03t0:15_4: Tattha saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitapadādīsu saccādīhipi yathāsambhavaṁ saṅgahāsaṅgaho yadipi vutto,
tika-abh03t0:15_7: sopi “cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā”tiādinā pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammuddhāre
tika-abh03t0:15_11: Pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammuddhārepi pana pucchāvissajjanesu ca rūpakkhandhādīnaṁ araṇantānaṁ yathāsambhavaṁ
tika-abh03t0:15_12: sampayogavippayogā catūheva khandhehi hontīti “catūhi sampayogo,catūhi vippayogo”ti vuttaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:16_3: Na hi rūpaṁ rūpena nibbānena vā vippayuttaṁ hoti,
tika-abh03t0:16_5: catūheva pana khandhehi hotīti catunnaṁ khandhānaṁ rūpanibbānehi vippayogopi vippayujjamānehi catūhi khandhehi niyamito tehi vinā vippayogābhāvato.
tika-abh03t0:16_9: sārammaṇassa sārammaṇena anārammaṇena missakena ca hotīti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t0:18_5: catūhi vippayogo”ti etenapi visuṁ yojanā kātabbā.
tika-abh03t0:18_6: Tena saṅgaho asaṅgaho ca sabhāgo visabhāgo ca bhāvo,
tika-abh03t0:18_7: tathā sampayogo vippayogo cāti ayamattho viññāyati.
tika-abh03t0:18_8: Yassa vā saṅgaho ca asaṅgaho ca,
tika-abh03t0:20_1: mātikā”ti etena ṭhapanākārena bahi piṭṭhito ṭhapitattāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:20_2: Etena vā ṭhapanākārena kusalādīnaṁ araṇantānaṁ idha aṭṭhapetvā dhātukathāya mātikato bahi pakaraṇantaramātikāya
tika-abh03t0:20_3: imassa pakaraṇassa mātikābhāvena ṭhapitattā tathā pakāsitattāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:21_2: Saṅgahoti atthaṁ avatvā aniddhāritatthassa saddasseva vuttattā.
tika-abh03t0:21_3: Saṅgaho asaṅgahotiādīsu saddesu saṅgahasaddo tāva attano atthavasena catubbidhoti ayañhetthattho.
tika-abh03t0:21_4: Atthopi vā aniddhāritaviseso sāmaññena gahetabbataṁ patto “saṅgaho asaṅgaho”tiādīsu “saṅgaho”ti vuttoti na koci doso.
tika-abh03t0:21_5: Niddhārite hi visese tassa ekavidhatā siyā,
tika-abh03t0:21_7: Jātisaddassa sāpekkhasaddattā “jātiyā saṅgaho”ti vutte “attano jātiyā”ti viññāyati sambandhārahassa aññassa
tika-abh03t0:21_8: avuttattāti jātisaṅgahoti rūpakaṇḍe vutto sajātisaṅgaho vutto hoti.
tika-abh03t0:22_1: sampayogo vippayogo”ti ime dve pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammavisesaṁ aniddhāretvā sāmaññena dhammānaṁ pucchanavissajjananayauddesā,
tika-abh03t0:22_3: “Saṅgahitena asaṅgahita”nti hi “saṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṁ asaṅgahita”nti vattabbe ekassa asaṅgahitasaddassa lopo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:22_7: Esa nayo tatiyādīsu dasamāvasānesu nayuddesesu chaṭṭhavajjesu.
tika-abh03t0:22_8: Tesupi hi vuttanayena dvīhi dvīhi padehi pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammavisesaniddhāraṇaṁ katvā tattha
tika-abh03t0:22_13: Tattha hi sabhāvantarena sabhāvantarassa visesanaṁ kataṁ,
tika-abh03t0:22_15: Ekādasamādīsu pana catūsu ādipadeneva dhammavisesaniddhāraṇaṁ katvā itarehi pucchanavissajjananayā uddiṭṭhā.
tika-abh03t0:22_17: Pucchāvissajjanānañhi nissayabhūtā dhammā saṅgahitatādivisesena karaṇabhūtena sampayuttavippayuttādibhāvaṁ attano visesentīti.
tika-abh03t0:23_3: Sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttā ca sabbe ca cittuppādā sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttasabbacittuppādā,
tika-abh03t0:23_5: Adhimokkho hi sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttānaṁ cittuppādānaṁ sādhāraṇavasena vutto,
tika-abh03t0:23_7: Tattha sādhāraṇā pasaṭā pākaṭā cāti ādito pariggahetabbā,
tika-abh03t0:23_9: asādhāraṇāpi pana pariggahetabbāvāti tesu mahāvisayena aññesampi saṅgahādipariggahaṁ dassetuṁ adhimokkho uddiṭṭho.
tika-abh03t0:23_10: “Sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttā”ti ca dhammasaṅgahavaṇṇanāyaṁ paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge ca vacanaṁ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:23_12: tesaṁ sabbesaṁ sādhāraṇatoti pana atthe sati sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇesu vattabbesu yo asādhāraṇesu mahāvisayo adhimokkho,
tika-abh03t0:23_13: tassa vasena vuttasabbacittuppādasādhāraṇato phassādayo sabbasādhāraṇāti adhimokkho ca asādhāraṇesu mahāvisayoti
tika-abh03t0:23_14: katvā vutto aññassa tādisassa abhāvāti ayamadhippāyo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:24_0: Jīvitindriyaṁ panettha rūpamissakattā na vuttanti veditabbaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:24_1: cittekaggatā pana asamādhisabhāvā sāmaññasaddeneva sāmaññavisesasaddehi ca samādhisabhāvā visesasaddavacanīyaṁ
tika-abh03t0:24_2: aññaṁ byāpetabbaṁ nivattetabbañca natthīti anaññabyāpakanivattakasāmaññavisesadīpanato tasseva dhammassa
tika-abh03t0:24_4: na sukhādisabhāvā vedanā viya vuttalakkhaṇaviparītehi sāmaññavisesasaddeheva,
tika-abh03t0:24_5: tasmā “cittekaggatā”ti ayaṁ sāmaññasaddo samādhisabhāve visesasaddanirapekkho pavattamāno sayameva visesasaddamāpajjitvā
tika-abh03t0:24_7: itaro ca samādhisabhāvamevāti dvidhā bhinnā cittekaggatā asādhāraṇā ceva appavisayā cāti idha uddesaṁ na arahati.
tika-abh03t0:24_8: Abhinnāpi vā phassādīnaṁ viya pākaṭattābhāvato aññadhammanissayena vattabbato ca sā jīvitañca na arahatīti na uddiṭṭhāti.
tika-abh03t0:29_2: tesaṁ pana sabhāvato abhiññātānaṁ dhammānaṁ pariññeyyatādivisesadassanatthaṁ saccāni,
tika-abh03t0:29_3: adhipatiyādikiccavisesadassanatthaṁ indriyādīni ca vuttānīti saccādiviseso viya saṅgahāsaṅgahaviseso
tika-abh03t0:29_4: ca abhiññeyyanissito vuccamāno suviññeyyo hotīti “tīhi saṅgaho.
tika-abh03t0:29_6: Evañca katvā “catūhī”ti vuttā sampayogavippayogā ca abhiññeyyanissayena khandhādīheva pucchitvā vissajjitāti.
tika-abh03t0:29_7: Rūpakkhandho ekena khandhenāti ye dhammā “rūpakkhandho”ti vuccanti,
tika-abh03t0:29_8: tesaṁ pañcasu khandhesu rūpakkhandhabhāvena sabhāgatā hotīti rūpakkhandhabhāvasaṅkhātena,
tika-abh03t0:29_9: rūpakkhandhavacanasaṅkhātena vā gaṇanena saṅgahaṁ gaṇanaṁ dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:29_14: Pañcasu khandhagaṇanesu ekena khandhagaṇanena gaṇitoti ayañhettha attho.
tika-abh03t0:30_0: Asaṅgahanayaniddeseti idaṁ “saṅgaho asaṅgaho”ti etasseva nayassa ekadesanayabhāvena vuttaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:30_2: Rūpakkhandhamūlakāyeva cettha dukatikacatukkā dassitāti etena vedanākkhandhamūlakā purimena yojiyamāne
tika-abh03t0:30_3: viseso natthīti pacchimeheva yojetvā tayo dukā dve tikā eko catukko,
tika-abh03t0:30_5: saṅkhārakkhandhamūlako eko dukoti ete labbhantīti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:30_6: Tesaṁ pana bhedato pañcakapucchāvissajjanānantaraṁ pucchāvissajjanaṁ kātabbaṁ saṁkhittanti daṭṭhabbaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:30_7: vuttanayena vā sakkā ñātunti pāḷiṁ na āropitanti.
tika-abh03t0:32_1: ekake pana sadisavissajjanānaṁ cakkhundriyasotindriyasukhindriyādīnaṁ dukādīsu asadisavissajjanaṁ diṭṭhaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:32_4: idha pana dukkhasamudayadukkhamaggadukānaṁ aññamaññaṁ tikena ca sadisaṁ vissajjananti dukatikesveva sadisavissajjanataṁ
tika-abh03t0:34_2: avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā ekena khandhenā”ti likhitabbepi pamādavasena “avijjā ekena khandhenā”ti idaṁ na likhitanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:34_3: Sarūpekasesaṁ vā katvā avijjāvacanena avijjāvissajjanaṁ dassitanti.
tika-abh03t0:34_4: Sabbampi vipākaviññāṇanti ettha vipākaggahaṇena visesanaṁ na kātabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:34_5: Kusalādīnampi hi viññāṇānaṁ dhātukathāyaṁ saṅkhārapaccayāviññāṇādipadehi saṅgahitatā vippayuttenasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitapadaniddese
tika-abh03t0:34_6: “vipākā dhammā”ti imassa vissajjanāsadisena tesaṁ vissajjanena dassitā,
tika-abh03t0:34_7: idha ca nāmarūpassa ekādasahāyatanehi saṅgahavacanena akammajānampi saṅgahitatā viññāyatīti.
tika-abh03t0:35_3: tāni rūpassa nibbattipākabhedabhūtāni ruppanabhāvena gayhantīti rūpakkhandhadhammasabhāgāni,
tika-abh03t0:35_7: tathā duvidhānipi tāni cakkhāyatanādīhi ekantaparamatthakiccehi agayhamānāni nissattaṭṭhena dhammāyatanadhammadhātudhammehi sabhāgāni,
tika-abh03t0:35_8: tena tehi khandhādīhi saṅgayhantīti “jāti dvīhi khandhehī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t0:38_1: Saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitapadaniddese yaṁ taṁ uddese asaṅgahitatāya pucchitabbaṁ vissajjitabbañca saṅgahitatāvisiṭṭhaṁ
tika-abh03t0:38_3: tadeva tāva dassento “cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā”ti āha.
tika-abh03t0:38_4: Sabbattha khandhādisaṅgahasāmaññānaṁ niccaṁ visesāpekkhattā bhedanissitattā ca pucchāvissajjanānaṁ savisesāva khandhādigaṇanā suddhā.
tika-abh03t0:38_5: Tattha saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitavacanamattena dhammavisesassa niddhāritattā tīsu saṅgahesu ekena dvīhi vā ye saṅgahitā hutvā aññehi asaṅgahitā,
tika-abh03t0:38_6: teyeva dhammā “khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā”ti ettakeneva dassetabbā siyuṁ,
tika-abh03t0:38_7: tesaṁ pana evaṁvidhānaṁ asambhavā nayamātikāya ca abbhantarabāhiramātikāpekkhattā uddesepi yaṁ yaṁ rūpakkhandhādīsu araṇantesu saṅgāhakaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:38_8: taṁ taṁ apekkhitvā saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitaṁ niddhāritanti viññāyatīti tena tena saṅgāhakena yathāniddhāritaṁ
tika-abh03t0:38_12: itaresu ca yaṁ yaṁ pucchitabbavissajjitabbaṁ niddhāritaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:38_13: tassa tassa niyāmakabhāvena rūpakkhandhādayo araṇantā uddiṭṭhāti.
tika-abh03t0:39_3: Ettha ca yena yena saṅgāhakena khandhādisaṅgahesu tena tena saṅgahetabbāsaṅgahetabbaṁ aññaṁ atthi,
tika-abh03t0:39_5: Rūpakkhandhena pana khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahetabbo añño dhammo natthi,
tika-abh03t0:39_7: na ca so eva tassa saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako vā hoti.
tika-abh03t0:39_9: tañca na tasseva tena saṅgahitataṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:39_10: rūpakkhandhabhāvena pana rūpakkhandhavacanena vā gahitataṁ sandhāya vuttanti pakāsitoyamattho.
tika-abh03t0:40_0: Yadi ca so eva tena saṅgayheyya,
tika-abh03t0:40_2: “vedanākkhandhena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā,
tika-abh03t0:40_3: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā”tiādi vattabbaṁ siyā,
tika-abh03t0:40_5: tasmā yathā cittaṁ cittena sampayuttaṁ vippayuttañca na hoti,
tika-abh03t0:40_6: evaṁ rūpakkhandho rūpakkhandhena saṅgahito asaṅgahito ca na hoti,
tika-abh03t0:40_8: Na hi so eva tassa sabhāgo visabhāgo cāti.
tika-abh03t0:40_15: yena te samudāyassa samudāyo ca tesaṁ sabhāgo visabhāgo ca siyāti,
tika-abh03t0:40_16: tathā na samudāyo ekadesasabhāgavisabhāgānaṁ saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako ca.
tika-abh03t0:40_17: Yathā dhammāyatanaṁ sukhumarūpasabhāgassa vedanādivisabhāgassa ca rūpakkhandhekadesassa khandhasaṅgahena,
tika-abh03t0:40_18: jīvitindriyaṁ rūpārūpajīvitasabhāgavisabhāgassa rūpakkhandhekadesassa saṅkhārakkhandhekadesassa ca jīvitavajjassa khandhasaṅgaheneva.
tika-abh03t0:40_21: tasmā satipi attato attani antogadhato attekadesasabhāgato ca aññassa asaṅgāhakatte saṅgāhakattameva etesaṁ natthi,
tika-abh03t0:40_22: yena saṅgahitassa asaṅgāhakā siyunti saṅgāhakattābhāvato eva evarūpānaṁ aggahaṇaṁ veditabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:41_0: Yaṁ pana “dhammāyatanaṁ asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi saṅgahita”nti,
tika-abh03t0:41_1: “cakkhāyatanañca sotāyatanañca ekena khandhena saṅgahita”nti ca vuttaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:41_4: catukkhandhagaṇanabhedehi pana dhammāyatanassa gaṇetabbāgaṇetabbabhāvena pañcadhā bhinnataṁ,
tika-abh03t0:41_6: Saṅgāhakāsaṅgāhakanirapekkhānaṁ gaṇetabbāgaṇetabbānaṁ taṁtaṁgaṇanehi gaṇanadassanamattameva hi paṭhamanayo kammakaraṇamattasabbhāvā,
tika-abh03t0:41_7: dutiyādayo pana saṅgāhakāsaṅgāhakehi saṅgahitāsaṅgahitānaṁ agaṇanādidassanāni kattukaraṇakammattayasabbhāvā.
tika-abh03t0:41_8: Tathā paṭhamanaye tathā tathā gaṇetabbāgaṇetabbabhāvasaṅkhāto taṁtaṁkhandhādibhāvābhāvo sabhāgavisabhāgatā,
tika-abh03t0:42_1: na saṅgahitaṁ asaṅgahetabbanti asaṅgāhakattābhāvato na uddhaṭāni.
tika-abh03t0:42_2: Dukkhasaccasadisāni tehi visabhāgasamudāyabhūtehi anekakkhandhehi khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahetabbaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:42_4: Evaṁ saṅgāhakattābhāvato asaṅgāhakattābhāvato ubhayābhāvato ca yathāvuttasadisāni anuddharitvā saṅgāhakattāsaṅgāhakattabhāvato
tika-abh03t0:42_6: Tattha “cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā”ti cakkhāyatanavajjā rūpadhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitāti veditabbā,
tika-abh03t0:43_3: Taṁ pana rūpakkhandhādīsu na yujjatīti taṁ vissajjanaṁ rūpakkhandhādīsu saṅgāhakesu na yujjatīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:43_5: saṅgahitoti etena nayena cakkhāyatanena rūpakkhandhova saṅgahito,
tika-abh03t0:43_6: so ca aḍḍhekādasahi āyatanadhātūhi asaṅgahito nāma natthīti evaṁ cakkhāyatanādīnipi na gahetabbānīti āpajjatīti ce?
tika-abh03t0:43_12: Rūpakkhandhena hi rūpakkhandhova saṅgahitoti yathā cakkhāyatanena cakkhāyatanato aññampi khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitaṁ atthi,
tika-abh03t0:43_14: na evaṁ rūpakkhandhena rūpakkhandhato aññaṁ khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitaṁ atthi,
tika-abh03t0:43_16: rūpakkhandhena pana rūpakkhandhova khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitoti ayañhettha adhippāyo yutto.
tika-abh03t0:43_17: Siyā panetaṁ “so eva rūpakkhandho rūpakkhandhena āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi asaṅgahito hotū”ti,
tika-abh03t0:43_18: taṁ nivārento āha “so ca aḍḍhekādasahi āyatanadhātūhi asaṅgahito nāma natthī”ti.
tika-abh03t0:43_20: Tattha rūpakkhandho rūpakkhandhassa vā tadekadesānaṁ vā cakkhādīnaṁ āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako
tika-abh03t0:43_21: ca na hotīti iminā pariyāyena asaṅgahitatāya abhāvo vuttoti yujjati,
tika-abh03t0:43_22: na rūpakkhandhena rūpakkhandhassa tadekadesānaṁ vā aḍḍhekādasahi āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgahitatāya.
tika-abh03t0:43_26: Tena hi tīhipi saṅgahehi rūpakkhandho tadekadeso vā saṅgahitā siyuṁ,
tika-abh03t0:44_1: aññāni cāti etthāpi cakkhāyatanādīhi viya etehi aññehi ca saṅgahitānaṁ asaṅgahitatāya abhāvato etāni
tika-abh03t0:44_2: aññāni ca yathā vā tathā vā etāni viya ayujjamānavissajjanattā evarūpāni padāni saṅgāhakabhāvena na gahitānīti
tika-abh03t0:45_0: Tattha yaṁ vuttaṁ “rūpakkhandhena hi rūpakkhandhova saṅgahito”ti,
tika-abh03t0:45_3: tañca satipi saṅgahitatte asaṅgahitatāya abhāvatoti viññāyamānaṁ samudayasaccādīsu yujjeyya sati tehi saṅgahite tadasaṅgahitattābhāvato.
tika-abh03t0:45_6: tasmā saṅgāhakattābhāvo evettha aggahaṇe kāraṇanti yuttaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:45_7: Saṅgahitattābhāvena asaṅgahitattaṁ yadipi rūpakkhandhādinā attano attani antogadhassa attekadesasabhāgassa ca natthi,
tika-abh03t0:45_8: aññassa pana atthīti na dukkhasaccādīsu viya ubhayābhāvo cettha aggahaṇe kāraṇaṁ bhavituṁ yuttoti.
tika-abh03t0:45_9: Dhammāyatanajīvitindriyādīnañca khandhacatukkadukādisaṅgāhakatte sati na tesaṁ saṅgahitānaṁ tehi dhammāyatanajīvitindriyādīhi
tika-abh03t0:45_10: āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi asaṅgahitatā natthīti asaṅgahitatāya abhāvo anekantiko,
tika-abh03t0:46_0: Anidassanaṁ punadeva sappaṭighanti ettha anidassananti etena “sanidassanasappaṭigha”nti ettha vuttena
tika-abh03t0:46_2: Punadevāti etena tattheva avisiṭṭhaṁ sanidassanapadaṁ nivattetvā gaṇhanto sanidassanadukapadaṁ dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:46_3: “Cakkhāyatanena cakkhāyatanamevekaṁ saṅgahita”nti idaṁ na sakkā vattuṁ.
tika-abh03t0:46_4: Na hi “cakkhāyatanena cakkhāyatanaṁ āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahita”nti ca “asaṅgahita”nti ca vattabbanti dassitoyaṁ nayoti.
tika-abh03t0:46_5: Evaṁ sabbattha tasseva samudāyekadesānañca saṅgāhakasaṅgahitanti vacanesu asaṅgāhakaasaṅgahitanti vacanesu ca tadavattabbatā yojetabbā.
tika-abh03t0:46_6: Asaṅgāhakattābhāvato eva hi cakkhāyatanādīni cakkhāyatanādīhi asaṅgahitānīti na vuccanti,
tika-abh03t0:49_1: Asaṅgahitenasaṅgahitapadaniddese rūpakkhandhena khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitesu vedanādīnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ khandhānaṁ
tika-abh03t0:49_2: nibbānassa ca sukhumarūpena saha āyatanadhātusabhāgatte satipi na sukhumarūpameva rūpakkhandhoti rūpakkhandhena
tika-abh03t0:49_4: tasmā na tena tāni āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgahitāni.
tika-abh03t0:49_6: asaṅgahitānipi tena tāni tehi saṅgahehi na honteva tadekadesena sukhumarūpena āyatanadhātusabhāgattā,
tika-abh03t0:49_8: viññāṇakkhandhacakkhāyatanādīhi pana asaṅgahitā na te tehi kathañci sammissāti sabbathā te tehi na saṅgahitā.
tika-abh03t0:49_9: Dukkhasaccādīhi ca pañcakkhandhasamudāyabhūtehi khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitaṁ nibbānaṁ rūpakkhandhena
tika-abh03t0:49_10: viya āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgahitaṁ tehi na hoti,
tika-abh03t0:49_11: tasmā saṅgāhakattābhāvato eva evarūpānaṁ asaṅgāhakabhāvena aggahaṇaṁ veditabbaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:49_15: na ca attano ekadeso attekadesasabhāgo ca attanā asaṅgahito hotīti attanā asaṅgahitasaṅgāhakattā pana vedanākkhandhādīnaṁ gahaṇaṁ katanti.
tika-abh03t0:50_0: Yaṁ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṁ vuttaṁ “ye dhammāyatanena saṅgahitā”ti,
tika-abh03t0:50_2: Dhammāyatanena hi na koci dhammo kenaci saṅgahena saṅgahito atthi visabhāgakkhandhanibbānasamudāyattā,
tika-abh03t0:50_3: khandhasaṅgahena sayameva attano saṅgāhakaṁ na hotīti āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi ca saṅgāhakattābhāvatoti
tika-abh03t0:50_4: dassitoyaṁ nayoti etassa dhammāyatanagaṇanena gaṇitāti attho. Yāni…pe…
tika-abh03t0:50_5: gahitānīti etena viññāṇasammissaṁ dhammāyatanekadesaṁ dīpentāni iddhipādādipadāni,
tika-abh03t0:50_8: sakaladhammāyatanadīpakāni dhammāyatanādipadāni ca vajjetvā dhammāyatanekadesaṁ aññāyatanena asammissaṁ dīpentāni gahitānīti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:53_1: Saṅgahitenasaṅgahitapadaniddese yasmā yathā dutiyatatiyanayā tiṇṇaṁ saṅgahānaṁ saṅgahaṇāsaṅgahaṇappavattivisesena “saṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:53_4: Saṅgahaṇappavattiyā eva hi saṅgahitena saṅgahitaṁ uddiṭṭhaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:53_6: tasmā saṅgahaṇappavattivisesavirahe saṅgahitadhammāsaṅgahitadhammavisese nissitā ete dve nayāti ettha
tika-abh03t0:53_7: kenaci saṅgahitena dhammavisesena puna saṅgahito dhammaviseso saṅgahitena saṅgahito saṅgahitatāya pucchitabbo
tika-abh03t0:53_9: tameva tāva yathāniddhāritaṁ dassento “samudayasaccena ye dhammā khandha…pe…
tika-abh03t0:53_13: Ettha ca ye tīhipi saṅgahehi na saṅgāhakā rūpakkhandhaviññāṇakkhandhadhammāyatanadukkhasaccādīni viya,
tika-abh03t0:53_14: ye ca dvīhāyatanadhātusaṅgahehi asaṅgāhakā cakkhāyatanādīni viya,
tika-abh03t0:53_15: ye ca ekena khandhasaṅgaheneva dhātusaṅgaheneva ca na saṅgāhakā vedanādikkhandhanirodhasaccajīvitindriyādīni viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātādayo viya ca,
tika-abh03t0:53_16: te dhammā saṅgāhakattābhāvasabbhāvā saṅgāhakabhāvena na uddhaṭā,
tika-abh03t0:53_19: Tehi saṅgahitāpi hi ekantena attano saṅgāhakassa saṅgāhakā honti,
tika-abh03t0:53_20: yassa puna saṅgaho pucchitabbo vissajjitabbo cāti.
tika-abh03t0:54_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana sakalena hi khandhādipadenāti sakalavācakena rūpakkhandhādipadenāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:54_1: Yaṁ panetaṁ vuttaṁ “yaṁ attano saṅgāhakaṁ saṅgaṇhitvā puna teneva saṅgahaṁ gaccheyyā”ti,
tika-abh03t0:54_2: taṁ tena khandhādipadenāti evaṁ ayojetvā taṁ aññaṁ saṅgahitaṁ nāma natthīti evaṁ na sakkā vattuṁ.
tika-abh03t0:54_7: Yathā vedanā saddo ca khandho āyatanañca,
tika-abh03t0:54_12: Yampi cetaṁ vuttaṁ “tadeva yehi dhammehi khandhādivasena saṅgahitaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:54_15: Na hi saṅgahitena saṅgahitassa saṅgahitena saṅgaho ettha pucchito vissajjito ca,
tika-abh03t0:54_17: tasmā ekena khandhenāti ekena khandhagaṇanenāti ayamevettha attho,
tika-abh03t0:54_19: Na hi eko khandho attano ekadesassa saṅgāhakoti.
tika-abh03t0:57_3: satipi ekena dvīhi vā saṅgahehi kesañci asaṅgāhakatte tīhipi asaṅgahetabbassa abhāvato paripuṇṇasaṅgahāsaṅgāhakā na honti,
tika-abh03t0:57_4: abyākatadhammasadisā kenaci saṅgahena asaṅgahetabbabhāvato asaṅgāhakā eva na honti,
tika-abh03t0:58_0: Yaṁ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṁ “tādisena hi padena nibbānaṁ khandhasaṅgahamattaṁ na gaccheyyā”ti vuttaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:58_4: Sadisavissajjanānaṁ vasena samodhānetvā katehi saddhinti evaṁ katehi dutiyapañhādīhi saddhiṁ paṭhamapañhanāmarūpapañhādayo
tika-abh03t0:58_11: Tattha tadevāti eva-saddena na taṁ kadāci saṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṁ na hotīti uddhaṭasseva asaṅgahitenaasaṅgahitabhāve
tika-abh03t0:58_12: niyatataṁ aññassa ca aniyatataṁ dassetīti veditabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:58_13: “Tadeva yehi asaṅgahita”nti ettha hi “niyamato”ti sakkā vacanaseso yojetunti.
tika-abh03t0:58_14: Atha vā tadevāti pucchāya uddhaṭameva evaṁpakārameva hutvā yehi asaṅgahitanti tassa pucchāya uddhaṭabhāvena
tika-abh03t0:58_17: Pucchāya uddhaṭañhi aññasahitaṁ asahitañca asaṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṁ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:59_0: Avasesā saṅgahitāti idaṁ avasesā asaṅgahitā na hontīti evaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:59_1: Tehipi viññāṇadhammehi te rūpadhammāva tīhi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitāti pucchāya uddhaṭā tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgāhakā hutvā asaṅgahitāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:59_3: Ettha ca paṭhame naye vedanādayopi viññāṇena asaṅgahitāti vuttā,
tika-abh03t0:59_5: Vedanādayo hi rūpaviññāṇeheva khandhādisaṅgahena asaṅgahitāti oḷārikarūpehi viññāṇena ca tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:60_1: Catutthapañhe cakkhāyatanaṁ vedanādīhi catūhīti ettha cakkhāyatananti etena pucchāya uddhaṭaṁ asaṅgāhakaṁ dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:60_2: Cakkhāyatanena pana asaṅgahitena asaṅgahitāni dasa oḷārikāyatanāni na cakkhāyatanamevāti.
tika-abh03t0:60_3: “Rūpañca dhammāyatana”ntiādinā yehi dhammehi tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṁ taṁ viññāṇameva hoti,
tika-abh03t0:60_4: asaṅgahitena tena asaṅgahitañca viññāṇavajjaṁ sabbaṁ teva dhamme udāneti.
tika-abh03t0:60_6: Tattha paṭhamena rūpakkhandhena sadisavissajjanesu ekato udānetvā dassitesu aññe visadisavissajjanā nayadānena dassitā honti.
tika-abh03t0:60_11: Yena asaṅgāhakena asaṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṁ pucchitabbaṁ vissajjitabbañca paricchijjati,
tika-abh03t0:60_12: so rūpakkhandhādiko tassa pucchāvissajjanānañca nissayabhāvato “visayo”ti vutto,
tika-abh03t0:63_3: taṁ sabbaṁ pucchāya gahitanti idaṁ na rūpakkhandhādīni padāni sandhāya vuttaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:63_5: Rūpakkhandhādīsu hi yaṁ dhammāyatanādipadaṁ na labbhati,
tika-abh03t0:63_12: nibbānassa ca rūpena saddhiṁ sampayogo nāma natthīti ekuppādādisabhāgatāya abhāvato sampayogaṁ nivārentena
tika-abh03t0:63_13: sā eva ekuppādāditā etesaṁ visabhāgatāti tadabhāvato vippayogopi nivārito eva hotīti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t0:63_14: Catūsu hi khandhesu vijjamānā ekuppādāditā tesaṁ aññamaññaṁ sabhāgatā hoti rūpanibbānehi tesaṁ tehi ca rūpanibbānānaṁ visabhāgatā ca,
tika-abh03t0:63_15: na ca rūpekadesassa nibbānassa vā sā ekuppādāditā atthi,
tika-abh03t0:63_16: yā rūpekadesena rūpekadesanibbānānaṁ nibbānena ca rūpassa visabhāgatā siyā.
tika-abh03t0:64_0: Sattasuviññāṇadhātūsu ekāyapi avippayutteti yathā rūpabhavo tīhi viññāṇadhātūhi,
tika-abh03t0:64_2: avitakkaavicārā ekāya vippayutte anārammaṇamissake dhamme dīpenti,
tika-abh03t0:64_3: evaṁ adīpetvā ekāyapi vippayutte ahonte sattahipi sampayutte sattapi vā tā dīpentīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:64_4: Avippayutteti hi ye vippayuttā na honti,
tika-abh03t0:64_7: Tena yāni tāhi sampayutte dīpenti dhammāyatanādipadāni,
tika-abh03t0:64_8: yāni ca sampayuttavippayuttabhāvehi navattabbaṁ dīpenti acetasikādipadāni,
tika-abh03t0:64_10: tesaṁ sabbesaṁ anārammaṇamissakadhammadīpakānaṁ aggahaṇaṁ vuttaṁ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:64_11: Na hi anārammaṇamissakasabbaviññāṇadhātutaṁsampayuttatadubhayasamudāyānaṁ khandhāyatanadhātūsu kenaci sampayogo vippayogo vā atthīti.
tika-abh03t0:65_0: Yadi evaṁ vippayuttenavippayuttapadaniddese “kusalehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā,
tika-abh03t0:65_1: tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā”ti na vattabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:65_10: tasmā khandhādīni anāmasitvā vippayuttatāmattena yathāniddhāritadhammadassane kusalehi itaresaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:65_11: itarehi ca kusalānaṁ vippayogo na na hoti visabhāgatāsabbhāvatoti tesaṁ aññamaññavippayuttatā vuttā.
tika-abh03t0:66_0: Uddāne pana aṭṭhārasa tato pareti idaṁ “soḷasā”ti vattabbaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:66_3: ekadesā samudayasaccavedanākkhandhādayo ekadesasammissā ca iddhipādādayo anārammaṇehi asammissā rūpakkhandhādayo
tika-abh03t0:66_4: ca sārammaṇehi asammissā sampayogīvippayogībhāvena samānakālasantānehi ca ekadesantarehi vibhattā eva
tika-abh03t0:66_5: gahitāti tehi te kehici ekadesantarehi vibhattehi yathāyogaṁ sampayogaṁ vippayogañca labhanti.
tika-abh03t0:66_6: Atthi hi tesaṁ ekuppādāditā sabhāgatā visabhāgatā cāti.
tika-abh03t0:66_7: Tena tattha tattha “ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayutta”nti ca,
tika-abh03t0:66_8: “ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici vippayutta”nti ca vuttaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:66_9: Bhinnakālasamudāyā eva pana vedanāsaññāviññāṇakkhandhā vattamānā ca ekekadhammā eva,
tika-abh03t0:66_10: tasmā tesaṁ samānakālassa vibhajitabbassa abhāvato na sukhindriyādīni vedanākkhandhassa vibhāgaṁ karonti,
tika-abh03t0:66_13: “cakkhuviññāṇadhātu ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena kehici vippayuttā”ti ca evamādi na vuttaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:66_14: khandhāyatanavibhāgavirahitampi pana viññāṇaṁ dhātuvibhāgena vibhattameva vuttanti “cakkhuviññāṇadhātu…pe…
tika-abh03t0:66_16: evamevaṁ indriyavibhāgena vibhattānaṁ sukhindriyādīnaṁ “sukhindriyena ye dhammā vippayuttā”tiādīsu yathāyogaṁ vippayogo daṭṭhabbo,
tika-abh03t0:67_1: Yathā taṁsampayogībhāvaṁ sandhāya “samudayasaccaṁ tīhi khandhehi sampayutta”nti vuttaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:67_2: evaṁ taṁvippayogībhāvaṁ sandhāya “tīhi khandhehi vippayutta”nti kasmā na vuttanti ce?
tika-abh03t0:67_4: Vibhāge hi sati samudayasaccaṁ sukhadukkhadomanassindriyehi manoviññāṇadhātuto aññaviññāṇadhātūhi vippayuttanti
tika-abh03t0:67_8: Yañhi anuppannā dhammā viya āmaṭṭhakālabhedaṁ na hoti saṅkhataṁ uddharitabbaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:67_10: tañca vibhāgarahitehi khandhādīhi saṅkhatehi paccuppannabhāvameva nissāya anāmaṭṭhakālabhede atthitāya eva nissitabbattā.
tika-abh03t0:67_14: vippayogo pana avijjamānatādīpake bhede gahite teneva visabhāgatāpi gahitā evāti hoti.
tika-abh03t0:67_15: Bhede pana aggahite tena tena gahaṇena visabhāgatāya aggahitattā sati sabhāgatte vijjamānatāya eva dhammānaṁ
tika-abh03t0:67_16: sabhāgassa paricchindanato vijjamānatā dassitāti ekuppādādibhāvasaṅkhātā sabhāgatāpi gahitā eva hoti.
tika-abh03t0:68_0: 262.“Dutiyajjhānavicārañhi ṭhapetvā sesā avitakkavicāramattā”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanaṁ ye padhānā vitakko viya koṭṭhāsantaracittuppādesu alīnā,
tika-abh03t0:68_1: te eva idha avitakkavicāramattāti adhippetāti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:68_2: Teneva hi anantaranaye samudayasaccena samānagatikā na savitakkasavicārehīti te na gahitā.
tika-abh03t0:68_3: Dasamosānanayesu ca tehi vippayuttehi vippayuttānaṁ tehi vippayuttānañca soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayogo aṭṭhārasasaṅgahito ca vutto.
tika-abh03t0:68_4: Vitakkasahitesupi pana tesu gahitesu sabbepi te vicārena sampayuttāti “ekena khandhena kehici sampayuttā”ti sakkā vattuṁ.
tika-abh03t0:68_5: So hi samudāyo vicāraṁ vajjetvā aññena kenaci sampayutto na hoti.
tika-abh03t0:68_6: Na hi tadekadesassa vitakkassa vicārato aññena sampayogo samudāyassa hoti.
tika-abh03t0:68_7: Yathā nānācittuppādesu uppajjamānānaṁ iddhipādānaṁ samudāyassa iddhipādassa ekadesānaṁ tīhi khandhehi sampayogo samudāyassa na hoti,
tika-abh03t0:68_9: Yathā pana tesu ekopi vedanāsaññākkhandhehi saṅkhārakkhandhekadesena ca asampayutto nāma natthīti samudāyassa tehi sampayuttatā vuttā,
tika-abh03t0:68_10: evamidhāpi vicārena asampayuttassa avitakkavicāramattassa kassaci abhāvato samudāyassa tena sampayuttatā na na sakkā vattuṁ.
tika-abh03t0:68_11: Na hi avitakkavicāramattānaṁ dassanenapahātabbahetukādīnaṁ viya sampayuttatā na vattabbā.
tika-abh03t0:68_12: Yathā hi dassanenapahātabbahetukesu keci saṅkhārakkhandhekadesena mohena sampayuttā,
tika-abh03t0:68_13: keci asampayuttāti na samudāyo tena sampayutto,
tika-abh03t0:68_15: yena so samudāyo sampayutto siyāti “dassanenapahātabbahetukā dhammā sampayuttāti natthī”ti vuttaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:68_17: Na panevaṁ yena avitakkavicāramattasamudāyo sampayutto siyā,
tika-abh03t0:68_18: taṁ natthi avitakkavicāramattesu kassaci vicārena asampayuttassa abhāvā,
tika-abh03t0:68_20: Sabbattha ca ekadhammepi kehicīti bahuvacananiddeso saṅkhāya aniyamitattā katoti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t0:71_1: Sampayuttenavippayuttapadaniddese rūpakkhandhādayo tehi sampayuttābhāvato na gahitā.
tika-abh03t0:71_3: sampayuttehi ca vippayutte sampayuttenavippayuttānaṁ khandhādīhi vippayogābhāvato.
tika-abh03t0:71_4: Na hi samudayasaccena sampayuttehi lobhasahagatacittuppādehi vippayuttānaṁ tato aññadhammānaṁ khandhādīsu kenaci vippayogo atthi.
tika-abh03t0:71_5: Nanu ca te eva cittuppādā cattāro khandhā aḍḍhadutiyāni āyatanāni aḍḍhadutiyā dhātuyo ca hontīti tehi vippayogo vattabboti? Na,
tika-abh03t0:71_7: Na hi te eva dhammā cattāro khandhā,
tika-abh03t0:71_8: atha kho te ca tato aññe ca,
tika-abh03t0:71_10: Na ca tadaññasamudāyehi aññe vippayuttā honti samudāyekadesānaṁ ekadesaññasamudāyānañca vippayogābhāvato.
tika-abh03t0:71_12: Avitakkavicāramattesupi niravasesesu adhippetesu tesaṁ savitakkasavicārasamānagatikattā aggahaṇe kāraṇaṁ na dissati.
tika-abh03t0:72_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana evarūpānīti yathā rūpakkhandhe vissajjanaṁ na yujjati,
tika-abh03t0:72_4: Yāni pana padāni dhammadhātuyā sampayutte dhamme dīpentīti etena vedanākkhandhādipadāni dasseti,
tika-abh03t0:72_6: Tattha aññena asammissanti asampayuttena asammissanti attho.
tika-abh03t0:72_8: Etena ca lakkhaṇena evarūpāneva gahitānīti dasseti,
tika-abh03t0:72_10: “Atha phassasattakaṁ cittaṁ saha yuttapadehi sattā”ti purāṇapāṭho,
tika-abh03t0:72_12: tike tayo satta mahantare cā”ti pāṭho kato.
tika-abh03t0:73_0: 309.Pucchāya uddhaṭapadeneva saddhiṁ vippayuttānaṁ vasenāti idaṁ pucchāya uddhaṭapadena sampayuttehi
tika-abh03t0:73_1: vippayuttā tena saddhiṁ vippayuttā hontīti katvā vuttaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:73_3: vitakkavicāraṇāti manodhātuyā ekantasampayuttā dve vitakkavicārāti savitakkapadaṁ savicārapadañca dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:76_1: Vippayuttenasampayuttapadaniddese rūpakkhandhādīhi vippayuttenasampayuttameva yathāniddhāritaṁ natthīti “rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā vippayuttā,
tika-abh03t0:76_2: tehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā”ti avatvā “rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā vippayuttā,
tika-abh03t0:76_5: Tena rūpakkhandhena vippayuttānaṁ kenaci khandhādinā sampayogābhāvato yathāniddhāritaṁ vippayuttenasampayuttameva natthi,
tika-abh03t0:76_6: kuto tassa puna khandhādīhi sampayuttatāti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:79_6: taṁ rūpakkhandhādīsu araṇantesu yena vedanākkhandhādinā sampayuttaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:79_7: puna tasseva vedanākkhandhādino khandhādīhi sampayogaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ kataṁ.
tika-abh03t0:79_8: Tañhi attanā sampayuttena sampayuttattā “sampayuttena sampayutta”nti niddhāritanti.
tika-abh03t0:79_9: Rūpena vāti etena nirodhasaccaappaccayaasaṅkhatehipi ayogo vutto hotīti daṭṭhabbo,
tika-abh03t0:79_10: tathā rūpamissakehi vāti etena anupādinnaanupādāniyādīhi nibbānamissakehipi.
tika-abh03t0:79_12: Sabbārūpakkhandhasaṅgāhakehīti vattamānānameva sampayogo labbhatīti vattamānesu ekampi dhammaṁ anapanetvā
tika-abh03t0:82_3: dukkhasaccacatumahābhavaabyākatādidhammā tehi vippayuttehi vippayuttānaṁ khandhādīhi vippayogābhāvatoti ayaṁ viseso veditabboti.
tika-abh03t0:85_1: Ekādasamanayavaṇṇanāyaṁ “te ca sesehi tīhi khandhehi ekena manāyatanena sattahi viññāṇadhātūhī”ti etesaṁ
tika-abh03t0:85_3: “Kehicī”ti etassa panatthaṁ dassetuṁ “saṅkhārakkhandhe dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu ca ṭhapetvā taṇha”nti
tika-abh03t0:85_4: etena “te cā”ti vutte samudayasaccena khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitadhamme visesetvā tesaṁ eva visesitānaṁ
tika-abh03t0:85_5: attavajjehi sesehi saṅkhārakkhandhe taṇhāya dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu ca taṇhāya vedanāsaññākkhandhehi
tika-abh03t0:85_6: sampayogārahehi sampayuttataṁ sandhāyāha “sesehi sampayuttattā kehici sampayuttā nāmā”ti.
tika-abh03t0:88_0: 417. Dvādasamanaye ca navamanaye viya sampayogārahāva labbhantīti āha “teyeva uddhaṭā”ti.
tika-abh03t0:91_1: Terasamanayavaṇṇanāyaṁ yehi tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṁ viññāṇameva hoti,
tika-abh03t0:91_2: te pāḷiyaṁ “rūpañca dhammāyatana”ntiādiuddānagāthāya dassitā bāvīsa dhammā “rūpakkhandhena sadisapañhā dhammā”ti vuttā.
tika-abh03t0:91_3: Yehi pana tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitāni arūpabhavena viya oḷārikāyatanāneva honti,
tika-abh03t0:91_4: te vuttāvasesā sabbe idha uddhaṭā “arūpabhavena sadisā”ti vuttā.
tika-abh03t0:91_5: Sesāti sesā pañcamanaye āgatā vedanākkhandhādayo satipi asaṅgāhakatte idha vissajjanaṁ na ruhantīti na uddhaṭā.
tika-abh03t0:91_6: Ye pana asaṅgāhakā eva na honti dukkhasaccādidhammā,
tika-abh03t0:91_10: Tattha tesañca sampayogo nāma natthīti rūpārūpadhammānaṁ asampayogehi vomissatāya sampayogo natthīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:92_0: Yadi pana te kadāci asabbaviññāṇadhātusampayuttā arūpadhammā rūpadhammā ca siyuṁ,
tika-abh03t0:92_1: na tesaṁ vippayogo natthīti “vippayogo ca natthī”ti na vuttaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:92_2: na vedanākkhandhena asaṅgahitānaṁ vippayogassa atthitāyāti veditabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:92_3: Ubhayābhāvato hi vedanākkhandhādayo idha na ruhantīti.
tika-abh03t0:92_4: Evaṁ panettha siyā “vedanākkhandhena hi khandhādivasena anārammaṇamissakā sattaviññāṇadhātudhammā asaṅgahitā honti,
tika-abh03t0:92_7: tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitānaṁ sampayogavippayogābhāvo aruhaṇe kāraṇaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:95_2: Jātiādittayassa cettha dhammasabhāvamattattā na kathañci sampayogo vippayogo ca ruhati ajjhattabahiddhadhammānaṁ sabbadhammasamodhānattā,
tika-abh03t0:95_4: Dukkhasaccādidhammāva idha tehi vippayuttānaṁ saṅgahāsaṅgahasabbhāvā gahitāti.
tika-abh03t0:96_0: Pāḷiuddānagāthāyaṁ samucchede na labbhantīti pariyosāne naye na labbhantīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:96_1: Moghapucchakena cāti alabbhamānā ca te moghapucchakena hetunā na labbhanti tesaṁ pucchāya moghattāti vuttaṁ hoti.
tika-abh03t0:96_3: tena ca saha osānanaye ete dhammā vippayogassapi abhāvā sabbathāpi na labbhantīti attho.
